title: The amount or the Cost of tenement shall be calculated by the C
clause_text: The amount or the Cost of tenement shall be calculated by the C.E.O., S.R.A. as per the policy sanctioned by the State Government in this behalf.
section: ALLOTMENT OF THE TENEMENTS TO THE NON PROTECTED OCCUPIERS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
